lines.text: No, Rochester, I was eating a grapefruit and it got out of control.
Listen, Phil, there's a train leaving for the east tonight. I'm going to be on it if I have to sit on the engineer's lap.
Well, we just got here. You know what Brenda said... this place grows on you.
Well, it'll have to grow on somebody else!

And now ladies and gentlemen, we bring you that rugged hero of the great outdoors, that strong silent sphynx of the prairie, that man among men where men are men... Jack Benny in Buck Benny Rides Again!
